title: Understanding and testing passenger perceptions of complexity in relation to fares and ticketing - a report by SPA Future Thinking
cleaned_text: Authored on 07 June 2012 Document PDF 712.72 KB Description Research on passengers' current perceptions of complexity in the fares and ticketing system. ORR protects the interests of rail and road users. We are improving the safety, value, and performance of railways and roads, today and in the future. Research on passengers' current perceptions of complexity in the fares and ticketing system.
